short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you detect malicious website and emails from malicious sender. If any threats detected, it will alert you not to open.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IObit Surfing Protection brings you a safer and ad-free online surfing experience. It checks almost all websites you access, thus you can browse freely without worrying about privacy leaks or property losses.
